title: PH accountants seen ready to level up in AI era
description: MORE than 600 accountants and business leaders gathered at JuanUp 2025 in Whitespace Manila with one clear message — the profession is ready to thrive in the age of artificial intelligence (AI). Organized by Juan by JuanTax, the event spotlighted how technology is transforming, not replacing, the accounting workforce.

title: AI giant Nvidia beats earnings expectations
description: (UPDATE) SAN FRANCISCO, California — Artificial intelligence (AI) powerhouse Nvidia reported quarterly earnings on Wednesday that beat expectations, but shares slipped amid concerns about an AI chip spending bubble and the company’s stalled business in China.

title: HP beats Q3 revenue estimates on AI PC adoption, Windows 11 upgrade
description: HP Inc. beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter (Q3) revenue on Wednesday, driven by growing demand for artificial intelligence (AI)-powered personal computers and Windows 11 upgrade cycle.
content:

title: Nvidia forecasts decelerating growth after two-year AI boom
description: Nvidia Corp., the world's most valuable company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, signaling that growth is decelerating after a staggering two-year boom in artificial intelligence spending.
content:
(Bloomberg/Ian King) — Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, signaling that growth is decelerating after a staggering two-year boom in artificial intelligence spending.

title: Can AI Truly Understand Emotions? Insights from RSS Chief
description: RSS Chief Mohan Bhagwat discusses the capabilities of Artificial Intelligence during a lecture series commemorating RSS's centenary. He highlights AI's language-learning potential while questioning its ability to grasp emotions. Bhagwat notes that even the Sangh is considering AI adoption after careful assessment.
content: On Thursday, RSS Chief Mohan Bhagwat raised thought-provoking questions about Artificial Intelligence's (AI) ability to comprehend emotions, despite its proficiency in learning languages. His remarks were made on the final day of a comprehensive thre... [541 chars]

title: The high price of regulating AI
description: The politics of artificial intelligence are quickly becoming a contest over regulation instead of enabling innovation.
content:
The politics of artificial intelligence are quickly becoming a contest over regulation, with lawmakers and agencies competing to demonstrate vigilance rather than focusing on enabling innovation.
The Senate’s decision to strip a decadelong federal mo... [6355 chars]

title: US GDP growth revised up to 3.3% as AI investment offsets mounting tariff costs
description: The Commerce Department revised US GDP growth for the second quarter to 3.3%, up from an initial estimate of 3%. This revision comes on the back of stronger-than-expected business investment, particularly in intellectual property and artificial intelligence, as well as an uptick in consumer spending.
content: The US economy grew more than expected in the second quarter. This growth came from increased business investment and a strong bounce back in consumer spending. Meanwhile, weekly jobless claims showed stability. This indicates that the labour market ... [1830 chars]

title: China AI Chip Leader Warns of Trading Risks After Stock Frenzy
description: Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker Cambricon Technologies Corp. issued a warning to investors about elevated trading risks after its shares more than doubled in one month.
content:

title: Nvidia CEO says AI boom far from over after tepid sales forecast
description: SAN FRANCISCO: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Wednesday (Aug 27) dismissed concern about an end to a spending boom on artificial intelligence chips and said opportunities will expand into a multi-trillion-dollar market over the next five years. content:
Pushing up the chipmaker's shares are expectations of demand from Big Tech, data centre owners known as hyperscalers and China.
